title: South Korea's Genesis BBQ books ticket to India via Baramati
description: Genesis BBQ, a top South Korean quick-service restaurant chain, will partner with Baramati Agro to enter the Indian market. Baramati Agro, known for its poultry and sugar business, will serve as the master franchisee. The first Genesis BBQ restaurant is expected to open in early 2025.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
